##### FILE: k8s_autoscale-CPU.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
      name: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - nginx
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/hpa-example
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:

##### FILE: k8s_autoscale-RPS_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/nginx:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: nginx.example.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nginx
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: k8s_cron_job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to opencost/CronJob/export-opencost:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  annotations:
    iam.amazonaws.com/role: staging-opencost
  name: export-opencost
  namespace: opencost
spec:
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  jobTemplate:
    metadata:
      name: export-opencost
    spec:
      activeDeadlineSeconds: 3600
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            iam.amazonaws.com/role: staging-opencost
          name: export-opencost
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /app/.venv/bin/python3
            env:
            - name: AWS_REGION
              value: us-west-2
            - name: KUBE_CLUSTER
              value: YOUR_CLUSTER_NAME_CHANGE_ME
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_FILE_KEY_PREFIX
              value: cluster=$(KUBE_CLUSTER)
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_S3_BUCKET
              value: YOUR_S3_BUCKET_NAME_CHANGE_ME
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_S3_REGION
              value: YOUR_S3_BUCKET_REGION_NAME_CHANGE_ME
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_SVC_HOSTNAME
              value: opencost.opencost.svc.cluster.local.
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_SVC_PORT
              value: "9003"
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_STORAGE_BACKEND
              value: '[aws, azure]'
            image: ghcr.io/opencost/opencost-parquet-exporter:latest
            imagePullPolicy: Always
            name: export-opencost
            resources:
              limits:
                cpu: "2"
                memory: 10Gi
              requests:
                cpu: "1"
                memory: 2Gi
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - ALL
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
              runAsNonRoot: true
              runAsUser: 1000
            terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
            terminationMessagePolicy: File
          dnsConfig:
            options:
            - name: single-request-reopen
            - name: ndots
              value: "2"
          dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
          restartPolicy: Never
          securityContext: {}
          serviceAccount: K8S_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_CHANGE_ME
          serviceAccountName: K8S_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME_CHANGE_ME
          terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 14400
  schedule: 0 6 * * *
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 3
  suspend: false

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource opencost/CronJob/export-opencost

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource opencost/CronJob/export-opencost
policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource opencost/CronJob/export-opencost failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-cronjob-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource opencost/CronJob/export-opencost failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource opencost/CronJob/export-opencost failed:
1 - autogen-cronjob-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-cronjob-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/jobTemplate/spec/template/metadata/labels/

##### FILE: k8s_cron_job1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to opencost/CronJob/export-opencost:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  annotations:
    iam.amazonaws.com/role: staging-opencost
  name: export-opencost
  namespace: opencost
spec:
  concurrencyPolicy: Forbid
  failedJobsHistoryLimit: 1
  jobTemplate:
    metadata:
      name: export-opencost
    spec:
      activeDeadlineSeconds: 3600
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            iam.amazonaws.com/role: staging-opencost
          name: export-opencost
        spec:
          containers:
          - command:
            - /app/.venv/bin/python3
            env:
            - name: AWS_REGION
              value: us-west-2
            - name: KUBE_CLUSTER
              value: YOUR_CLUSTER_NAME_CHANGE_ME
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_FILE_KEY_PREFIX
              value: cluster=$(KUBE_CLUSTER)
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_S3_BUCKET
              value: YOUR_S3_BUCKET_NAME_CHANGE_ME
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_S3_REGION
              value: YOUR_S3_BUCKET_REGION_NAME_CHANGE_ME
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_SVC_HOSTNAME
              value: opencost.opencost.svc.cluster.local.
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_SVC_PORT
              value: "9003"
            - name: OPENCOST_PARQUET_STORAGE_BACKEND
              value: '[aws, azure]'
            image: ghcr.io/opencost/opencost-parquet-exporter:latest
            imagePullPolicy: Always
            name: export-opencost
            resources:
              limits:
                cpu: "2"
                memory: 10Gi
              requests:
                cpu: "1"
                memory: 2Gi
            securityContext:
              capabilities:
                drop:
                - ALL
              readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
              runAsNonRoot: true
              runAsUser: 1000
            terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
            terminationMessagePolicy: File
          dnsConfig:
            options:
            - name: single-request-reopen
            - name: ndots
              value: "2"
          dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
          restartPolicy: Never
          securityContext: {}
          serviceAccount: K8S_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_CHANGE_ME
          serviceAccountName: K8S_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME_CHANGE_ME
          terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 14400
  schedule: 0 6 * * *
  successfulJobsHistoryLimit: 3
  suspend: false

##### FILE: k8s_deployment_service1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/devsecops:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: devsecops
  name: devsecops
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: devsecops
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: devsecops
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: replace
        name: devsecops-container
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 100
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: vol
      serviceAccountName: default
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: vol

---

##### FILE: k8s_deployment_service9.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/devsecops:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: devsecops
  name: devsecops
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: devsecops
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: devsecops
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: replace
        name: devsecops-container
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 100
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: vol
      serviceAccountName: default
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: vol

---

##### FILE: k8s_informer_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to <NAMESPACE>/Deployment/k8s-informer-INSTANCE_NAME:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: k8s_informer-INSTANCE_NAME
  name: k8s-informer-INSTANCE_NAME
  namespace: <NAMESPACE>
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: k8s_informer-INSTANCE_NAME
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: k8s_informer-INSTANCE_NAME
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubeconfig
        - in_cluster
        - --standalone
        - "true"
        command:
        - /k8s_informer
        env:
        - name: ACCEPT_EULA
          value: false
        - name: CLUSTER_NAME
          value: <CLUSTER_NAME>
        - name: RESYNC_MIN
          value: "0"
        - name: SEND_INTERVAL_SEC
          value: "10"
        - name: MAX_CI_IN_MESSAGE
          value: "50"
        - name: REFRESH_TIME_MIN
          value: "0"
        - name: FULL_DISCOVERY_MIN
          value: "1440"
        - name: READ_COMMAND_SEC
          value: "60"
        - name: HEARTBEAT_MIN
          value: "5"
        - name: MAX_QUEUE_SIZE_BYTES
          value: "104755200"
        - name: MAX_RETRY
          value: "5"
        - name: MAX_ECC_PAYLOAD_SIZE_BYTES
          value: "1048576"
        - name: PROXY_URL
          value: ""
        - name: INSTANCE_URL
          value: https://INSTANCE_NAME.service-now.com
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: CONTINUOUS_DISCOVERY
          value: "true"
        - name: ECC_SENDER_INTERVAL_SEC
          value: "30"
        - name: VERBOSE_LOGGING
          value: "false"
        - name: INFORMER_VERSION
          value: docker.io/servicenowdocker/informer:1.0.2
        - name: SKIP_TLS_CERT_VALIDATION
          value: "false"
        image: docker.io/servicenowdocker/informer:1.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: k8sinformer
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 200Mi
        terminationMessagePolicy: FallbackToLogsOnError
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/credentials
          name: credentials
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: Default
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: k8s-informer-repo-cred
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: servicenow
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: credentials
        secret:
          secretName: k8s-informer-cred-INSTANCE_NAME

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: k8s_PROD-deployment_service.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/devsecops:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: devsecops
  name: devsecops
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: devsecops
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: devsecops
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: replace
        name: devsecops-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 100
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: vol
      serviceAccountName: default
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: vol

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/productpage-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: productpage
    version: v1
  name: productpage-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: productpage
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "9080"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: productpage
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/istio/examples-bookinfo-productpage-v1:1.18.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: productpage
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      serviceAccountName: bookinfo-productpage
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/reviews-v2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: reviews
    version: v2
  name: reviews-v2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: reviews
      version: v2
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: reviews
        version: v2
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: LOG_DIR
          value: /tmp/logs
        image: docker.io/istio/examples-bookinfo-reviews-v2:1.18.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: reviews
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
        - mountPath: /opt/ibm/wlp/output
          name: wlp-output
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: wlp-output
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

##### FILE: k8s21_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/backend-book-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: backend-book-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: backend
      environment: dev
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: backend
        environment: dev
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_URL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: host
              name: mongodb-config
        - name: MONGODB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: database
              name: mongodb-config
        - name: MONGODB_OPTS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: option
              name: mongodb-config
        - name: MONGODB_LOGIN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: mongodb-secret
        - name: MONGODB_PWD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mongodb-secret
        image: spring-boot-k8s:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/liveness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 20
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: book-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health/readiness
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 20
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/sample-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: sample
  name: sample-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 0
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sample
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 2
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: sample
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONFIG_VALUE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: CONFIG_VALUE
              name: sample-config
        - name: PRIVATE_VALUE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PRIVATE_VALUE
              name: sample-secret
        image: sample-app
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: sample-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8089
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

apiVersion: v1
data:
  run.sh: |
    #!/bin/bash
    rm -rf /jmeter/jtl/test.jtl /jmeter/web/*
    jmeter -Dserver.rmi.ssl.disable=true -DthreadNum=120 -DloopNum=1 -DrampUpTime=1 -DtimeOut=500 -n -t /jmeter/jmx/test.jmx -l /jmeter/jtl/test.jtl -e -o /jmeter/web/ \
      -R `getent ahostsv4 jmeter-slaves-svc | cut -d' ' -f1 | sort -u | awk -v ORS=, '{print $1}' | sed 's/,$//'`
kind: ConfigMap

  labels:
    app: jmeter-run
  name: jmeter-run
  namespace: kube-jmeter

##### FILE: k8s-jmeter-master_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-jmeter/Deployment/jmeter-master:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    jmeter_mode: master
  name: jmeter-master
  namespace: kube-jmeter
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      jmeter_mode: master
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        jmeter_mode: master
      namespace: kube-jmeter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - while true; do sleep 30; done;
        command:
        - /bin/bash
        - -c
        - --
        env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Shanghai
        image: kamalyes/jmeter:5.5-plugins-11-jdk@sha256:4d2f007c108b944b0283afa76d2cb94f2b808999e425978b10829d7e2afd1c7a
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/bash
              - -c
              - mkdir -p /jmeter/{jmx,jtl,web}
        name: jmmaster
        ports:
        - containerPort: 60000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2
          requests:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 0.5Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /run.sh
          name: jmeter-cm
          subPath: run.sh
        - mountPath: /jmeter/web
          name: shared-data
      - image: nginx:stable-alpine
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 6
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: shared-data
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: jmeter-run
        name: jmeter-cm
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: shared-data

---

##### FILE: k8s-jmeter-slave.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-jmeter/Deployment/jmeter-slaves:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    jmeter_mode: slave
  name: jmeter-slaves
  namespace: kube-jmeter
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      jmeter_mode: slave
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        jmeter_mode: slave
      namespace: kube-jmeter
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: jmeter_mode
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - slave
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - command:
        - jmeter-server
        - -Dserver.rmi.localport=50000
        - -Dserver_port=1099
        - -Jserver.rmi.ssl.disable=true
        env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Shanghai
        image: kamalyes/jmeter:5.5-plugins-11-jdk@sha256:4d2f007c108b944b0283afa76d2cb94f2b808999e425978b10829d7e2afd1c7a
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          postStart:
            exec:
              command:
              - /bin/sh
              - -c
              - mkdir -p /jmeter/jmx
        name: jmslave
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1099
        - containerPort: 50000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1
          requests:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 0.5Gi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

kind: Deployment

  name: zookeeper-dep
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: zookeeper-pod
  strategy: {}

        app: zookeeper-pod

        ports:
        - containerPort: 2181

            cpu: 125m
            memory: 400Mi

            cpu: 70m
            memory: 200Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kafka-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kafka-dep
  name: kafka-dep
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka-pod
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper-svc:2181
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_HOST_NAME
          value: kafka-svc
        - name: KAFKA_CREATE_TOPICS
          value: R1
        image: wurstmeister/kafka
        name: kafka-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 400Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 70m
            memory: 200Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/LimitRange/limit-range:
apiVersion: v1
kind: LimitRange
metadata:
  name: limit-range
  namespace: default
spec:
  limits:
  - max:
      cpu: 1
      memory: 1Gi
    min:
      cpu: 60m
      memory: 6Mi
    type: Pod
  - default:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 100Mi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 100m
      memory: 10Mi
    max:
      cpu: 1
      memory: 1Gi
    maxLimitRequestRatio:
      cpu: 4
      memory: 10
    min:
      cpu: 60m
      memory: 6Mi
    type: Container
  - max:
      storage: 20Gi
    min:
      storage: 1Gi
    type: PersistentVolumeClaim

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dummy-db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dummy-db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dummy-db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: dummy-db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: dummy
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - sleep 10
        image: busybox
        name: sleep

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to k8s-metrics/DaemonSet/kube-otel-stack-prometheus-node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: metrics
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: kube-otel-stack
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-node-exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: prometheus-node-exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.1
    helm.sh/chart: prometheus-node-exporter-4.3.0
    jobLabel: node-exporter
    release: kube-otel-stack
  name: kube-otel-stack-prometheus-node-exporter
  namespace: k8s-metrics
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: kube-otel-stack
      app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: metrics
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: kube-otel-stack
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: prometheus-node-exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: prometheus-node-exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.3.1
        helm.sh/chart: prometheus-node-exporter-4.3.0
        jobLabel: node-exporter
        release: kube-otel-stack
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - args:
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        - --path.rootfs=/host/root
        - --web.listen-address=[$(HOST_IP)]:9100
        - --collector.filesystem.mount-points-exclude=^/(dev|proc|sys|var/lib/docker/.+|var/lib/kubelet/.+)($|/)
        - --collector.filesystem.fs-types-exclude=^(autofs|binfmt_misc|bpf|cgroup2?|configfs|debugfs|devpts|devtmpfs|fusectl|hugetlbfs|iso9660|mqueue|nsfs|overlay|proc|procfs|pstore|rpc_pipefs|securityfs|selinuxfs|squashfs|sysfs|tracefs)$
        env:
        - name: HOST_IP
          value: 0.0.0.0
        image: quay.io/prometheus/node-exporter:v1.3.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders: null
            path: /
            port: 9100
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          name: http-metrics
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders: null
            path: /
            port: 9100
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/root
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 65534
        runAsGroup: 65534
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: kube-otel-stack-prometheus-node-exporter
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: k8s-mysql-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/webook-live-mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webook-live-mysql
  name: webook-live-mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webook-live-mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webook-live-mysql
      name: webook-live-mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: root
        image: mysql:8.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: webook-live-mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-storage
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: webook-mysql-live-claim-v1

---

##### FILE: k8s-ocp-web-console_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to auth-system/Deployment/console:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: console
  name: console
  namespace: auth-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: console
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: console
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BRIDGE_K8S_MODE
          value: off-cluster
        - name: BRIDGE_K8S_MODE_OFF_CLUSTER_ENDPOINT
          value: https://kubernetes.default
        - name: BRIDGE_K8S_MODE_OFF_CLUSTER_SKIP_VERIFY_TLS
          value: "true"
        - name: BRIDGE_PLUGINS
          value: monitoring-plugin=http://localhost
        - name: BRIDGE_V
          value: "7"
        - name: BRIDGE_K8S_MODE_OFF_CLUSTER_THANOS
          value: http://kubemon-prometheus.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:9090
        - name: BRIDGE_K8S_MODE_OFF_CLUSTER_ALERTMANAGER
          value: http://kubemon-alertmanager.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:9093
        - name: BRIDGE_K8S_AUTH
          value: oidc
        - name: BRIDGE_USER_AUTH
          value: oidc
        - name: BRIDGE_BASE_ADDRESS
          value: https://console.apps.k8s.cloudcafe.tech
        - name: BRIDGE_DEX_API_HOST
          value: https://auth.apps.k8s.cloudcafe.tech
        - name: BRIDGE_USER_AUTH_OIDC_ISSUER_URL
          value: https://auth.apps.k8s.cloudcafe.tech/
        - name: BRIDGE_USER_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_ID
          value: oidc-auth-client
        - name: BRIDGE_USER_AUTH_OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET
          value: secret
        - name: BRIDGE_USER_AUTH_OIDC_CA_FILE
          value: /tmp/tls.crt
        image: quay.io/openshift/origin-console:4.10
        name: console-app
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/tls.crt
          name: dex-cert
          subPath: tls.crt
      volumes:
      - name: dex-cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: dex

---

##### FILE: k8s-ocp-web-console_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to auth-system/Ingress/console:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: selfsigned-issuer
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-body-size: "0"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-read-timeout: "600"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/proxy-send-timeout: "600"
  name: console
  namespace: auth-system
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: console.apps.k8s.cloudcafe.tech
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: console
            port:
              number: 9000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - console.apps.k8s.cloudcafe.tech
    secretName: console-cert

---

##### FILE: k8spodreplicas_editor_role.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/k8spodreplicas-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: timeterra
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: k8spodreplicas-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: timeterra
  name: k8spodreplicas-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - timeterra.d3vlo0p.dev
  resources:
  - k8spodreplicas
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - timeterra.d3vlo0p.dev
  resources:
  - k8spodreplicas/status
  verbs:
  - get

apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota

  name: quota-demo
  namespace: rs-demo

  hard:

    #   name: my-secret-pull-registry

      cassandra:
        repository: "k8ssandra/cass-management-api"
      dse:
        repository: "datastax/dse-mgmtapi-6_8"

kind: Deployment

    pixie-demo: px-k8ssandra
  name: cass-operator-controller-manager
  namespace: px-k8ssandra

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
      name: cass-operator
      pixie-demo: px-k8ssandra
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
        name: cass-operator
        pixie-demo: px-k8ssandra
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/configs/controller_manager_config.yaml
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACE
          value: ""
        image: k8ssandra/cass-operator:v1.15.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: webhook-server
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/k8s-webhook-server/serving-certs
          name: cert
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /configs
          name: manager-config
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: cass-operator-controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: webhook-server-cert
      - configMap:
          name: cass-operator-manager-config
        name: manager-config

      io.kompose.service: petclinic-backend
      pixie-demo: px-k8ssandra
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f ../docker-compose.yaml
        kompose.version: 1.28.0 (c4137012e)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/spring-petclinic-reactive-default: "true"

      - env:

          value: demo-dc1-service

          value: cassandra
        - name: CASSANDRA_PASSWORD
          value: cassandra
        - name: CASSANDRA_PORT
          value: "9042"
        - name: CASSANDRA_CONTACT_POINTS
          value: demo-dc1-service:9042
        - name: CASSANDRA_KEYSPACE_CQL
          value: 'CREATE KEYSPACE IF NOT EXISTS spring_petclinic WITH REPLICATION
            = { ''class'' : ''SimpleStrategy'', ''replication_factor'' : 1 };'
        - name: CASSANDRA_KEYSPACE_CREATE
          value: "true"
        - name: CASSANDRA_KEYSPACE_NAME
          value: spring_petclinic
        - name: CASSANDRA_LOCAL_DC
          value: dc1
        - name: CASSANDRA_USE_ASTRA
          value: "false"
        - name: DISTRIBUTED_TRACING_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: DISTRIBUTED_TRACING_URL
          value: http://tracing-server:9411
        - name: LISTENING_PORT
          value: "9966"
        - name: MONITORING_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: MONITORING_LISTENING_PORT
          value: "9967"
        - name: MONITORING_METRICS
          value: "false"
        - name: MONITORING_PROMETHEUS
          value: "false"
        image: gcr.io/pixie-prod/demos/petclinic/backend:1.0@sha256:8f3bfb03da53e13d25a70291631d35aff259ce038b5dce61a8ea182766e7594b
        name: petclinic-backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9966
        - containerPort: 9967

        - sh
        - -c
        - set -xe; while true; do sleep 2; curl http://${BACKEND_SERVICE}:${BACKEND_PORT}/petclinic/api/pets;
          done;
        env:
        - name: BACKEND_SERVICE
          value: petclinic-backend
        - name: BACKEND_PORT
          value: "9966"
        image: gcr.io/pixie-oss/pixie-dev-public/curl:multiarch-7.87.0@sha256:f7f265d5c64eb4463a43a99b6bf773f9e61a50aaa7cefaf564f43e42549a01dd
        name: backend-load-generator
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - set -xe; while ! cqlsh demo-dc1-service 9042 -u cassandra -p cassandra -e
          "describe cluster" ; do echo "waiting until cassandra is available"; sleep
          2; done;
        env:
        - name: CASSANDRA_HOST
          value: demo-dc1-service
        - name: CASSANDRA_PORT
          value: "9042"
        image: cassandra:3.11.8@sha256:f38395460cdaf4ccf4da72766dd076069c39ce47ffc51e5bdfaecfca843d964a
        name: cassandra-wait
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: k8ssandra1_41.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to px-k8ssandra/Deployment/cass-operator-controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    control-plane: controller-manager
    pixie-demo: px-k8ssandra
  name: cass-operator-controller-manager
  namespace: px-k8ssandra
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      control-plane: controller-manager
      name: cass-operator
      pixie-demo: px-k8ssandra
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        control-plane: controller-manager
        name: cass-operator
        pixie-demo: px-k8ssandra
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/configs/controller_manager_config.yaml
        command:
        - /manager
        env:
        - name: WATCH_NAMESPACE
          value: ""
        image: k8ssandra/cass-operator:v1.15.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9443
          name: webhook-server
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp/k8s-webhook-server/serving-certs
          name: cert
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /configs
          name: manager-config
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
      serviceAccountName: cass-operator-controller-manager
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - name: cert
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: webhook-server-cert
      - configMap:
          name: cass-operator-manager-config
        name: manager-config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/MutatingWebhookConfiguration/k8ssandra-operator-mutating-webhook-configuration:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: MutatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/inject-ca-from: px-k8ssandra/k8ssandra-operator-serving-cert
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    pixie-demo: px-k8ssandra
  name: k8ssandra-operator-mutating-webhook-configuration
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    service:
      name: k8ssandra-operator-webhook-service
      namespace: px-k8ssandra
      path: /mutate-v1-pod-secrets-inject

          value: 'CREATE KEYSPACE IF NOT EXISTS spring_petclinic WITH REPLICATION
            = { ''class'' : ''SimpleStrategy'', ''replication_factor'' : 1 };'
        - name: CASSANDRA_KEYSPACE_CREATE
          value: "true"
        - name: CASSANDRA_KEYSPACE_NAME
          value: spring_petclinic

          value: dc1

          value: "false"
        - name: DISTRIBUTED_TRACING_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: DISTRIBUTED_TRACING_URL
          value: http://tracing-server:9411
        - name: LISTENING_PORT
          value: "9966"
        - name: MONITORING_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: MONITORING_LISTENING_PORT
          value: "9967"
        - name: MONITORING_METRICS
          value: "false"
        - name: MONITORING_PROMETHEUS
          value: "false"
        image: gcr.io/pixie-prod/demos/petclinic/backend:1.0@sha256:8f3bfb03da53e13d25a70291631d35aff259ce038b5dce61a8ea182766e7594b

        - containerPort: 9967

        - sh
        - -c

          done;

        - name: BACKEND_SERVICE
          value: petclinic-backend
        - name: BACKEND_PORT
          value: "9966"

        name: backend-load-generator

      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - set -xe; while ! cqlsh demo-dc1-service 9042 -u cassandra -p cassandra -e
          "describe cluster" ; do echo "waiting until cassandra is available"; sleep
          2; done;
        env:
        - name: CASSANDRA_HOST
          value: demo-dc1-service
        - name: CASSANDRA_PORT
          value: "9042"

        name: cassandra-wait

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: static-routes

  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

##### FILE: k8s-staticroute-operator-v1.0.0_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to static-routes/DaemonSet/k8s-staticroute-operator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  annotations:
    provider: digitalocean
  name: k8s-staticroute-operator
  namespace: static-routes
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: k8s-staticroute-operator
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        provider: digitalocean
      labels:
        name: k8s-staticroute-operator
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OPERATOR_NAME
          value: k8s-staticroute-operator
        - name: NODE_HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: digitalocean/k8s-staticroute-operator:v1.0.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: k8s-staticroute-operator
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 150Mi
          requests:
            memory: 100Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_ADMIN
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
      hostNetwork: true
      serviceAccountName: k8s-staticroute-operator
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: ctfd
        value: "true"
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: chall
        value: "true"

---

##### FILE: k8svalidator-deployment_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/k8s-ext-conn-validator:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: k8s-ext-conn-validator
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: k8s-ext-conn-validator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: k8s-ext-conn-validator
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_PASS
          value: <password>
        - name: DB_URL
          value: <db-url>
        - name: DB_USER
          value: <user-name>
        image: vokdevops/utils/k8s-ext-conn-validator:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /actuator/health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: k8s-ext-conn-validator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

##### FILE: k8up_templates_cleanup-hook_10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/k8up-cleanup-roles:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: post-install,post-upgrade,post-delete
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation,hook-succeeded
    helm.sh/hook-weight: "2"
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: k8up
    helm.sh/chart: k8up-4.5.1
  name: k8up-cleanup-roles
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - ""
  resources:
  - namespaces
  verbs:
  - get
  - list
- apiGroups:
  - rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  resources:
  - rolebindings
  - roles
  verbs:
  - delete

---

##### FILE: k8up_templates_cleanup-hook_11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRoleBinding/cleanup-rolebinding:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: post-install,post-upgrade,post-delete
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation,hook-succeeded
    helm.sh/hook-weight: "3"
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: k8up
    helm.sh/chart: k8up-4.5.1
  name: cleanup-rolebinding
  namespace: default
roleRef:
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: k8up-cleanup-roles
subjects:
- kind: ServiceAccount
  name: cleanup-service-account
  namespace: default

##### FILE: k8up_templates_cleanup-hook_12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/my-release-cleanup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: post-install,post-upgrade,post-delete
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation,hook-succeeded
    helm.sh/hook-weight: "4"
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: k8up
    helm.sh/chart: k8up-4.5.1
  name: my-release-cleanup
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
        app.kubernetes.io/name: k8up
      name: my-release
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - |
          #!/bin/bash

          NAMESPACES=$(kubectl get namespace -ojson | jq -r '.items[].metadata.name')

          for ns in $NAMESPACES
          do
            kubectl -n "$ns" delete rolebinding pod-executor-namespaced --ignore-not-found=true
            kubectl -n "$ns" delete role pod-executor --ignore-not-found=true
          done
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        image: docker.io/bitnami/kubectl:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: my-release-cleanup
      restartPolicy: Never
      serviceAccountName: cleanup-service-account

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/my-release-cleanup

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Job/my-release-cleanup
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Job/my-release-cleanup failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Job/my-release-cleanup failed:
1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Job/my-release-cleanup failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Job/my-release-cleanup failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Job/my-release-cleanup failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource default/Job/my-release-cleanup failed:

##### FILE: k8up_templates_clusterrolebinding_6.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRoleBinding/my-release-k8up:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: my-release
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: k8up
    helm.sh/chart: k8up-4.5.1

  namespace: default

        app.kubernetes.io/name: k8up

        - operator
        env:
        - name: BACKUP_IMAGE
          value: ghcr.io/k8up-io/k8up:v2.8.0
        - name: BACKUP_ENABLE_LEADER_ELECTION
          value: "true"
        - name: BACKUP_SKIP_WITHOUT_ANNOTATION
          value: "false"
        - name: BACKUP_OPERATOR_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: ghcr.io/k8up-io/k8up:v2.8.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /metrics
            port: http
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: k8up-operator
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext: {}
      securityContext: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kafka:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kafka
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: kafka-config
        image: apache/kafka:3.7.0
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
        - containerPort: 9093
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kafka/data
          name: kafka-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: kafka-data

          value: "1"

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kafka-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kafka
  name: kafka-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka
  template:

        app: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KAFKA_BROKER_ID
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper-service:2181
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP
          value: PLAINTEXT:PLAINTEXT,PLAINTEXT_INTERNAL:PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: PLAINTEXT://:29092,PLAINTEXT_INTERNAL://kafka-service:9092
        - name: KAFKA_OFFSETS_TOPIC_REPLICATION_FACTOR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_MIN_ISR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_REPLICATION_FACTOR
          value: "1"
        image: confluentinc/cp-kafka:7.0.1
        name: broker
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kafka/StatefulSet/kafka:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kafka-app
  name: kafka
  namespace: kafka
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka-app
  serviceName: kafka-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - tail
        - -f
        - /dev/null
        env:
        - name: REPLICAS
          value: "3"
        - name: SERVICE
          value: kafka-svc
        - name: SHARE_DIR
          value: /mnt/kafka
        image: docker.io/bitnami/kafka:3.7.0-debian-12-r2
        name: kafka-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
        - containerPort: 9093
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/kafka
          name: kafka-storage
      volumes:
      - name: kafka-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: kafka-pv-claim

##### FILE: kafka27.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kafka/Deployment/kafka:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kafka
  namespace: kafka
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: PLAINTEXT://kafka:9092
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP
          value: PLAINTEXT:PLAINTEXT,PLAINTEXT_HOST:PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_INTER_BROKER_LISTENER_NAME
          value: PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper:2181
        image: wurstmeister/kafka:2.12-2.5.0
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
      volumes:
      - name: kafka-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: kafka-pvc

---

      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

    io.kompose.service: kafka

      io.kompose.service: kafka

      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: kafka
    spec:
      containers:

        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_HOST_NAME
          value: kafka-service
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_PORT
          value: "9092"
        - name: KAFKA_CREATE_TOPICS
          value: order:5:1
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper:2181
        - name: KAFKA_AUTO_CREATE_TOPICS_ENABLE
          value: "False"
        - name: JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS
          value: -XX:+PreserveFramePointer

          protocol: TCP
        resources: {}
      restartPolicy: Always
status: {}

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  name: kafka-broker
  namespace: default

      app: kafka-broker

          value: "2"

          value: INTERNAL://0.0.0.0:9094,OUTSIDE://0.0.0.0:9092
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: INTERNAL://localhost:9094,OUTSIDE://kafka-broker.default:9092
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP
          value: INTERNAL:PLAINTEXT,OUTSIDE:PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_INTER_BROKER_LISTENER_NAME
          value: INTERNAL
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper-service.default:2181
        - name: KAFKA_OFFSETS_TOPIC_REPLICATION_FACTOR
          value: "1"
        image: confluentinc/cp-kafka:latest
        name: kafka-broker
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092

##### FILE: kafka-client4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kafka/Pod/kafka-client:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: kafka-client
  namespace: kafka
spec:
  containers:
  - args:
    - |
      #!/bin/bash
      set -e
      echo "Iniciando generacin de credenciales..."
      TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD=123456
      USER_ALIAS=my-user

      # Directorios y archivos
      SECRETS_DIR=/mnt/secrets
      OUTPUT_DIR=/mnt/output
      TRUSTSTORE_FILE=$OUTPUT_DIR/truststore.jks
      USER_P12_FILE=$OUTPUT_DIR/user.p12
      CLIENT_PROPERTIES_FILE=$OUTPUT_DIR/client.properties
      TEMP_CA=$SECRETS_DIR/ca.crt
      TEMP_USER_CERT=$SECRETS_DIR/user.crt
      TEMP_USER_KEY=$SECRETS_DIR/user.key

      # Crear directorio de salida
      mkdir -p $OUTPUT_DIR

      # Importar el certificado de la CA en el truststore
      echo "Importando certificado de la CA en el truststore..."
      echo "yes" | keytool -import -trustcacerts -file "$TEMP_CA" -keystore "$TRUSTSTORE_FILE" -storepass "$TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD" -noprompt

      # Crear archivo PKCS12 con el certificado y clave privada del usuario
      echo "Generando archivo PKCS12 del usuario..."
      RANDFILE=/tmp/.rnd openssl pkcs12 -export -in "$TEMP_USER_CERT" -inkey "$TEMP_USER_KEY" -name "$USER_ALIAS" -password pass:"$TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD" -out "$USER_P12_FILE"

      echo "Creando archivo client.properties..."
      cat <<EOF > "$CLIENT_PROPERTIES_FILE"
      security.protocol=SSL
      ssl.truststore.location=$TRUSTSTORE_FILE
      ssl.truststore.password=$TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD
      ssl.keystore.location=$USER_P12_FILE
      ssl.keystore.password=$TRUSTSTORE_PASSWORD
      EOF

      echo "Archivos generados exitosamente en $OUTPUT_DIR:"
      echo " - $TRUSTSTORE_FILE"
      echo " - $USER_P12_FILE"
      echo " - $CLIENT_PROPERTIES_FILE"

      # Mantener el contenedor corriendo
      exec sleep infinity
    command:
    - /bin/bash
    - -c
    image: quay.io/strimzi/kafka:0.42.0-kafka-3.6.0
    name: kafka-client
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 512Mi
      requests:
        cpu: 200m
        memory: 256Mi
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /mnt/secrets/ca.crt
      name: ca-secret
      readOnly: true
      subPath: ca.crt
    - mountPath: /mnt/secrets/user.crt
      name: user-secret
      readOnly: true
      subPath: user.crt
    - mountPath: /mnt/secrets/user.key
      name: user-secret
      readOnly: true
      subPath: user.key
    - mountPath: /mnt/output
      name: output-dir
  volumes:
  - name: ca-secret
    secret:
      secretName: kafka-server-cert
  - name: user-secret
    secret:
      secretName: my-kafka-user
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: output-dir

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kafka/Pod/kafka-client
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kafka/Pod/kafka-client failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kafka/Pod/kafka-client failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kafka/Pod/kafka-client failed:
1 - check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule check-for-labels failed at path /metadata/labels/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource kafka/Pod/kafka-client failed:
1 - validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource kafka/Pod/kafka-client failed:

##### FILE: kafkacluster_editor_role.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/kafkacluster-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: kafka-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: kafkacluster-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kafka-operator
  name: kafkacluster-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - kafka.kubedoop.dev
  resources:
  - kafkaclusters
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - kafka.kubedoop.dev
  resources:
  - kafkaclusters/status
  verbs:
  - get

---

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: kafka
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to strimzi/ConfigMap/kafka-metrics:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  kafka-metrics-config.yml: |
    lowercaseOutputName: true
    rules:
    - pattern: kafka.server<type=(.+), name=(.+), clientId=(.+), topic=(.+), partition=(.*)><>Value
      name: kafka_server_$1_$2
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        clientId: "$3"
        topic: "$4"
        partition: "$5"
    - pattern: kafka.server<type=(.+), name=(.+), clientId=(.+), brokerHost=(.+), brokerPort=(.+)><>Value
      name: kafka_server_$1_$2
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        clientId: "$3"
        broker: "$4:$5"
    - pattern: kafka.server<type=(.+), cipher=(.+), protocol=(.+), listener=(.+), networkProcessor=(.+)><>connections
      name: kafka_server_$1_connections_tls_info
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        cipher: "$2"
        protocol: "$3"
        listener: "$4"
        networkProcessor: "$5"
    - pattern: kafka.server<type=(.+), clientSoftwareName=(.+), clientSoftwareVersion=(.+), listener=(.+), networkProcessor=(.+)><>connections
      name: kafka_server_$1_connections_software
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        clientSoftwareName: "$2"
        clientSoftwareVersion: "$3"
        listener: "$4"
        networkProcessor: "$5"
    - pattern: "kafka.server<type=(.+), listener=(.+), networkProcessor=(.+)><>(.+):"
      name: kafka_server_$1_$4
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        listener: "$2"
        networkProcessor: "$3"
    - pattern: kafka.server<type=(.+), listener=(.+), networkProcessor=(.+)><>(.+)
      name: kafka_server_$1_$4
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        listener: "$2"
        networkProcessor: "$3"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+)Percent\w*><>MeanRate
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3_percent
      type: GAUGE
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+)Percent\w*><>Value
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3_percent
      type: GAUGE
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+)Percent\w*, (.+)=(.+)><>Value
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3_percent
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        "$4": "$5"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+)PerSec\w*, (.+)=(.+), (.+)=(.+)><>Count
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3_total
      type: COUNTER
      labels:
        "$4": "$5"
        "$6": "$7"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+)PerSec\w*, (.+)=(.+)><>Count
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3_total
      type: COUNTER
      labels:
        "$4": "$5"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+)PerSec\w*><>Count
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3_total
      type: COUNTER
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+), (.+)=(.+), (.+)=(.+)><>Value
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        "$4": "$5"
        "$6": "$7"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+), (.+)=(.+)><>Value
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        "$4": "$5"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+)><>Value
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3
      type: GAUGE
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+), (.+)=(.+), (.+)=(.+)><>Count
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3_count
      type: COUNTER
      labels:
        "$4": "$5"
        "$6": "$7"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+), (.+)=(.*), (.+)=(.+)><>(\d+)thPercentile
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        "$4": "$5"
        "$6": "$7"
        quantile: "0.$8"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+), (.+)=(.+)><>Count
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3_count
      type: COUNTER
      labels:
        "$4": "$5"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+), (.+)=(.*)><>(\d+)thPercentile
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        "$4": "$5"
        quantile: "0.$6"
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+)><>Count
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3_count
      type: COUNTER
    - pattern: kafka.(\w+)<type=(.+), name=(.+)><>(\d+)thPercentile
      name: kafka_$1_$2_$3
      type: GAUGE
      labels:
        quantile: "0.$4"
    - pattern: "kafka.server<type=raft-metrics><>(.+-total|.+-max):"
      name: kafka_server_raftmetrics_$1
      type: COUNTER
    - pattern: "kafka.server<type=raft-metrics><>(.+):"
      name: kafka_server_raftmetrics_$1
      type: GAUGE
    - pattern: "kafka.server<type=raft-channel-metrics><>(.+-total|.+-max):"
      name: kafka_server_raftchannelmetrics_$1
      type: COUNTER
    - pattern: "kafka.server<type=raft-channel-metrics><>(.+):"
      name: kafka_server_raftchannelmetrics_$1
      type: GAUGE
    - pattern: "kafka.server<type=broker-metadata-metrics><>(.+):"
      name: kafka_server_brokermetadatametrics_$1
      type: GAUGE

metadata:

    app: strimzi
  name: kafka-metrics
  namespace: strimzi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kafka/Service/kafka-service:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kafka-broker
  name: kafka-service
  namespace: kafka
spec:
  ports:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kafka-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kafka-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KAFKA_BROKER_ID
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENERS
          value: PLAINTEXT://:9092
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: PLAINTEXT://kafka-srv:9092
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper-srv:2181
        - name: ALLOW_PLAINTEXT_LISTENER
          value: "yes"
        image: bitnami/kafka:latest
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  name: kafka-deploy
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

    matchLabels:
      app: kafka

        app: kafka

          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_AUTO_CREATE_TOPICS_ENABLE
          value: "true"
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper-svc:2181
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENERS
          value: INTERNAL://0.0.0.0:29092,EXTERNAL://0.0.0.0:9092
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: INTERNAL://kafka-svc:29092, EXTERNAL://kafka-svc:9092
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP
          value: INTERNAL:PLAINTEXT, EXTERNAL:PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_INTER_BROKER_LISTENER_NAME
          value: INTERNAL
        image: wurstmeister/kafka
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kafka
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: PLAINTEXT://kafka:9092,PLAINTEXT_HOST://localhost:29092
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP
          value: PLAINTEXT:PLAINTEXT,PLAINTEXT_HOST:PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_INTER_BROKER_LISTENER_NAME
          value: PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper:2181
        - name: KAFKA_BROKER_ID
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_LOG4J_LOGGERS
          value: kafka.controller=INFO,kafka.producer.async.DefaultEventHandler=INFO,state.change.logger=INFO
        - name: KAFKA_OFFSETS_TOPIC_REPLICATION_FACTOR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_REPLICATION_FACTOR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_MIN_ISR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_JMX_PORT
          value: "9999"
        - name: KAFKA_JMX_HOSTNAME
          value: localhost
        - name: KAFKA_AUTHORIZER_CLASS_NAME
          value: kafka.security.authorizer.AclAuthorizer
        - name: KAFKA_ALLOW_EVERYONE_IF_NO_ACL_FOUND
          value: "true"
        image: confluentinc/cp-kafka:7.3.2
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
        - containerPort: 29092
        - containerPort: 9999

##### FILE: kafka-parallel-consumer-job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/kafka-parallel-consumer-job:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: kafka-parallel-consumer-job
  namespace: default
spec:
  completions: 3
  parallelism: 3
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - python
        - -uc
        - "from kafka import KafkaConsumer\n\nconsumer_group = \"consumer-0\"\nconsumer
          = KafkaConsumer(\n  \"my_topic\", \n  bootstrap_servers=[\"kafka:9092\"],
          \n  group_id=consumer_group\n)\nprint(\"Consumer group:\", consumer_group)\n\nwhile
          True:\n  message = consumer.poll(timeout_ms=75000)\n    \n  if not message:\n
          \   break\n  \n  for _, messages in message.items():\n    for msg in messages:\n
          \     print(msg.value)\n\nprint(\"Exiting...\")\n"
        image: tiketdatahansen/k8s_demo_python:1.0
        name: kafka-parallel-consumer-job
      restartPolicy: Never

---

  namespace: default

      kafka: producer
      lang: golang

        kafka: producer
        lang: golang

        - custom-topic

        - "10000"

        - "1000"

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/kafka-producer-cron:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  name: kafka-producer-cron
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - -n
            - "5"
            - -b
            - kafka:9092
            - -t
            - my_topic
            image: tiketdatahansen/kafka_producer:1.0
            name: kafka-producer-cron
          restartPolicy: Never
  schedule: '*/1 * * * *'

---

##### FILE: kafka-sample.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kafka-cat-producer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kafka-cat-producer
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka-cat-producer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka-cat-producer
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - "while true; do  echo -e 'send kafka message '`date`'\r\n'|kafkacat -P  -b
          my-release-kafka:9092 -t test; echo 'send message to kafka'; sleep $((1
          + RANDOM %!)(MISSING)); done"
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: confluentinc/cp-kafkacat
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: kafka-cat-producer

---

##### FILE: kafka-statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/kafka:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: kafka
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka
  serviceName: kafka
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KAFKA_PORT
          value: "9092"
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper:2181
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: PLAINTEXT://kafka:9092
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENERS
          value: PLAINTEXT://:9092
        - name: KAFKA_OFFSETS_TOPIC_REPLICATION_FACTOR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_MIN_ISR
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_TRANSACTION_STATE_LOG_REPLICATION_FACTOR
          value: "1"
        image: wurstmeister/kafka:latest
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
          name: server

---

##### FILE: kafka-stateful-set.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/kafka:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    service: kafka
  name: kafka
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: kafka
  serviceName: kafka
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        network/kafka-network: "true"
        service: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: INTERNAL://:29092,LISTENER_EXTERNAL://:9092
        - name: KAFKA_AUTO_CREATE_TOPICS_ENABLE
          value: "true"
        - name: KAFKA_INTER_BROKER_LISTENER_NAME
          value: INTERNAL
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENERS
          value: INTERNAL://:29092,LISTENER_EXTERNAL://:9092
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP
          value: INTERNAL:PLAINTEXT,LISTENER_EXTERNAL:PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper:2181
        image: bitnami/kafka:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 29092
        - containerPort: 9092
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kafka/
          name: kafka-data
      enableServiceLinks: false
      hostname: kafka
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: kafka-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: kafka-stateful-set1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/kafka:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  labels:
    service: kafka
  name: kafka
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      service: kafka
  serviceName: kafka
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        network/kafka-network: "true"
        service: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_LISTENERS
          value: INTERNAL://:29092,LISTENER_EXTERNAL://:9092
        - name: KAFKA_AUTO_CREATE_TOPICS_ENABLE
          value: "true"
        - name: KAFKA_INTER_BROKER_LISTENER_NAME
          value: INTERNAL
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENERS
          value: INTERNAL://:29092,LISTENER_EXTERNAL://:9092
        - name: KAFKA_LISTENER_SECURITY_PROTOCOL_MAP
          value: INTERNAL:PLAINTEXT,LISTENER_EXTERNAL:PLAINTEXT
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zookeeper:2181
        image: bitnami/kafka:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 29092
        - containerPort: 9092
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kafka/
          name: kafka-data
      enableServiceLinks: false
      hostname: kafka
      restartPolicy: Always
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 1000
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: kafka-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

---

##### FILE: kafka-sw-app.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kafka-broker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kafka-broker
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: KAFKA_ADVERTISED_HOST_NAME
          value: kafka-service
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECT
          value: zook:2181
        - name: KAFKA_BROKER_ID
          value: "1"
        - name: KAFKA_CREATE_TOPICS
          value: empire-announce:1:1,deathstar-plans:1:1
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_SESSION_TIMEOUT_MS
          value: "60000"
        - name: KAFKA_ZOOKEEPER_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_MS
          value: "60000"
        image: docker.io/wurstmeister/kafka:1.1.0
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092

---

##### FILE: kafka-sw-app1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/kafka-broker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: kafka-broker
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafka
      zgroup: kafkaTestApp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafka
        zgroup: kafkaTestApp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ADVERTISED_HOST
          value: kafka-service
        - name: ADVERTISED_PORT
          value: "9092"
        - name: CONSUMER_THREADS
          value: "1"
        - name: ZK_CONNECT
          value: zk.connect=localhost:2181/root/path
        - name: GROUP_ID
          value: groupid=test
        - name: TOPICS
          value: empire-announce,deathstar-plans,test-topic
        image: docker.io/cilium/kafkaproxy:1.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9092
        name: kafka
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9092
        readinessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 5
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9092
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/kafka-broker
